column1: Service Domain specification for Reward Points Account

column2: Track/log the allocation and remittance of rewards points. The service domain acts as a transaction log similar where the instrument is not subject to interest considerations (as with cash) but may have a finite life-time with expiry dates on reward points
Example of use:. A customer transaction that generates reward points is captured on the log, resulting in an increase in their available point balance
Administer the booking and remittance of rewards points
Capture reward points awards and remittance transactions. Process reward point expiry terms for limited life reward points
